title: Unakkagathane Intha Song Lyrics Kattradhu Thamizh
stanzas:
Unakkagathane Intha Song Lyrics Kattradhu Thamizh
#Yuvan #NaMuthukumar

Unakkaagathaane
indha uyir ulladhu.
un thuyaram saaya
en thol ulladhu.
mudiyaamal neelum
naal endrum illai

yaar enna sonnaal enna
anbae unnodu naanum
varuven

oru murai oru murai
nee sirithaal
naan vazhvadhil
artham aagum.

maru murai marumurai
nee sirithaal
en jenmathin saabam theerum

Unakkaagathaane
indha uyir ulladhu.
un thuyaram saaya
en thol ulladhu.
mudiyaamal neelum
naal endrum illai

yaar enna sonnaal enna
anbae unnodu naanum
varuven (2)

oru murai oru murai
nee sirithaal
naan vazhvadhil
artham aagum.

maru murai marumurai
nee sirithaal
en jenmathin saabam theerum

vaan paartha
boomi kaainthaalume
varappendrum azhiyaathadi

thaan paartha pinbam
tholaindhaalume
kannaadi marakkaathadi

mazhai vaasam varugindra
neram ellaam
un viyarvai tharum vaasam
varum allavaa

un ninaivil naan urangum
neram anbe
maranangal vandhaalum
varam allavaa

oru murai oru murai
nee sirithaal
naan vazhvadhil
artham aagum.

maru murai marumurai
nee sirithaal
en jenmathin saabam theerum
unakkaathanaane..

naam irukkum indha nodi
mudinthaalume
ninaivendrum mudiyaathadi

naam edutha nizharpadam
azhindhaalume
nijam endrum azhiyaathadi

naan kaetkum azhagaana
sangeethangal
nee enthan peyar sollum
pozhuthallavaa

en moochin swasangal
unathallavaa
nee indri en vazhkai
pazhuthallavaa

oru murai oru murai
nee sirithaal
naan vazhvadhil
artham aagum.

maru murai marumurai
nee sirithaal
en jenmathin saabam theerum

Unakkaagathaane
indha uyir ulladhu.
un thuyaram saaya
en thol ulladhu.
mudiyaamal neelum
naal endrum illai

yaar enna sonnaal enna
anbae unnodu
naanum varuven (2)
